heading: The share of employment in the touristic sector in the EU27 in 2019
subheading: In the entire EU27 as much as 2.54% of all employees are working in the selected tourism industries. Cyprus is leading with 9.15% and Poland has with only 1.01% the lowest share of employees in the selected tourism industries.
textNote: The data cover the following tourism activities: Air transport, including passenger and freight transport by airlines; Accommodation ; and Travel agencies, tour operators and other reservation services.
